ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | divclz.1 | |- A e. CC |

| 3 |  | divmulz.3 | |- C e. CC |
| 4 |  | divassap.4 | |- C # 0 |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( C e. CC /\ C # 0 ) |
| 6 |  | #P_divdirap | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ ( C e. CC /\ C # 0 ) ) -> ( ( A + B ) / C ) = ( ( A / C ) + ( B / C ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 5, 6 | #P_mp3an | |- ( ( A + B ) / C ) = ( ( A / C ) + ( B / C ) ) |
